text: @NYGovCuomo @1813Doncarlo Today House Democrats released their "phase 4" $3 trillion coronavirus relief proposal that would provide billions of additional aid to state and local governments, hospitals and other Democratic priorities but GOP is expected to kill it in the Senate. #GOPOnlyHelpsRichPeople
